TextView.android:text: Social Virtual Reality (VR) is a new emerging digital platform that offers a virtual space where people with their avatars can interact with others. But how we add an emotional texture to VR is the main problem to be solved. In virtual reality emotional information will be more helpful to create the environment more interactive as per the users state of mind. Itâ€™s incredibly important, particularly within a VR setting - that people feel connected to the experience on an instinctual level. The primary goal of the research to find out the algorithm that can predict the emotions accurately or near to the induced emotions which are collected or acquired in a real time with VR. Once the data is analyzed and processed, the system can take appropriate actions, that would be helpful in a case when negative emotions are detected.
